title: News reports from France. [No. 60/56] = Chroniques de France
brief_description: French cinemagazine items: 1. Aix-En-Provence - Takes us through the history of the picturesque town which is a bastion of European culture. 2. Christine Caron - The story of champion swimmer who becomes a singer and movie performer. 3. Le Sologne du Grand Meaulnes - Background to the writing of a famous French novel about adolescent love. 4. Cesar - A French sculptor who went from sculpting marble to working with junkyard metal scraps.
